name: Turkish Throne
description:
Turkish Throne invites you to immerse yourself in the intricate world of politics, where you lead your newly established political party in a fierce competition against five major rivals across the nation. Your ultimate goal? Seize power. Invest strategically in election campaigns, organize province visits, and maximize your voter base to secure a parliamentary majority. Rise through the ranks, claim the presidential seat, and navigate crucial decisions amidst a backdrop of diverse events. Will you wield influence and shape the destiny of the nation?

Gameplay

  • Make election investments and organise visits to provinces
  • Maximise your votes
  • Secure a parliamentary majority
  • Take the presidential seat
  • Make important decisions against different events
